author: Editorial Board
title: The war is not going Putin’s way. Congress must pass Ukraine aid swiftly.
description: Between the resistance of the Ukrainians and the unity of the West, Putin appears baffled.
content: The main reasons for this situation ones that offer signs of hope and yet are fraught with danger are the resistance of Ukraines army, bolstered by civilian volunteers, and by the inspirational leade… [+2719 chars]
